rawConfiguration.text:
# Web Monitoring 

Use the New Relic Browser monitoring agent to get deep visibility and actionable insights into real user experience on the website.

nrqlQueries.query: FROM PageViewTiming SELECT LATEST(windowLoad) WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}} FACET pageUrl

widgets.title: Initial Page Load and Route Change

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 50) FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE (`mobileOptimized` IS NULL) AND (category IN ('Initial page load', 'Route change')) LIMIT 1000 FACET CASES (WHERE category LIKE '%Initial page load%' AS 'Initial Page Load (Window load + AJAX)', WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}} AND category LIKE '%Route change%' AS 'Route Change') TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) AS 'HTTP Request' FROM AjaxRequest WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}} TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 50), percentile(windowLoad, 50), percentile(firstInteraction, 50) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}} LIMIT 1000

rawConfiguration.text:
# Transaction Information

You can track the detailed information of all connection requests received by the backend server using New Relic agents.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} AND (transactionType LIKE '%Web%' AND transactionSubType LIKE '%Expressjs%') EXTRAPOLATE FACET name LIMIT 10
SELECT average(apm.service.transaction.duration * 1000) AS 'Response Time' FROM Metric WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} AND (transactionType LIKE '%Web%') LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT apdex(newrelic.timeslice.value) AS `Apdex/Expressjs/POST//user/login` FROM Metric WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} AND metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Apdex/Expressjs/POST//user/login%' TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
# Application Monitoring

Trace the host related information at real-time using New Relic NodeJS agent. Your entire application can be observed.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(newrelic.timeslice.value), WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} AND metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Nodejs/EventLoop/CPU/Usage%') as 'Ticks per minute' FROM Metric TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000)/1000 AS 'Average', (max(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000)/1000 AS 'Max' FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName LIKE '%GC/System/Pauses%' AND appName = {{appName_nodejs}} TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT filter(rate(sum(newrelic.timeslice.value), 1 second), where metricTimesliceName LIKE '%CPU/System Time%') AS 'System', filter(rate(sum(newrelic.timeslice.value), 1 second), where metricTimesliceName LIKE '%CPU/User Time%') AS 'User' FROM Metric WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} TIMESERIES  AUTO

SELECT filter(average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 * 1000, where metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Memory/NonHeap/Used%') AS 'Non-Heap', filter(average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 * 1000, where metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Memory/Heap/Used%') AS 'V8 Heap (used)', filter(average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 * 1000, where metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Memory/Heap/Free%') AS 'V8 Heap (free)' FROM Metric WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}}

rawConfiguration.text:
# Database Monitoring

Using the New Relic MongoDB agent, you have the ability to understand database operations, connections, errors and indexes.

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_opcounters) WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} FACET legacy_op_type TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_connections) WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} FACET conn_type LIMIT 3

FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_dbstats_indexes) AS 'Total Database Indexes', average(mongodb_dbstats_indexSize)/1000 AS 'Average Database Index Size (KB)' WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}}

FROM Metric SELECT average(mongodb_ss_metrics_operation_scanAndOrder) AS 'Scan & Order', average(mongodb_ss_metrics_operation_writeConflicts) AS 'Write Conflicts' WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}}

rawConfiguration.text:
# Infrastructure Monitoring

Trace the host related information at real-time using New Relic Infra Agent. Your entire infrastructure can be observed, whether it is running on the dedicated server/container/cloud running in orchestrated environments.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(host.loadAverageOneMinute) AS '1 minute', average(host.loadAverageFiveMinute) AS '5 minutes', average(host.loadAverageFifteenMinute) AS '15 minutes' FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(host.net.transmitBytesPerSecond) AS 'Transmit bytes per second', average(host.net.receiveBytesPerSecond) AS 'Receive bytes per second' FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(host.process.cpuPercent) AS 'CPU%', latest(host.process.threadCount) AS 'Threads' FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} FACET processId, processDisplayName ORDER BY cpuPercent asc LIMIT 100
SELECT latest(mongodb_up) FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_connections) WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_metrics_commands_dropDatabase_total) WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(collection), latest(mongodb_dbstats_objects) AS 'Objects', latest(mongodb_dbstats_indexes) AS 'Indexes', latest(mongodb_dbstats_storageSize)/1000 AS 'Database Storage Size (KB)' WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} FACET database

FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_collstats_storageStats_avgObjSize) AS 'Average Object Size (KB)', latest(mongodb_collstats_storageStats_storageSize)/1000 AS 'Collection Storage Size (KB)' WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} FACET collection
SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_network_bytesIn) AS 'Bytes In' FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostName = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES 1 MINUTE
SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_network_bytesOut) AS `Bytes Out` FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostName = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES 1 MINUTE
SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_network_numRequests) FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostName = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES 1 MINUTE
FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_dbstats_views) WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}} TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) as 'Total transactions', average(duration) as 'Avg duration (s)', percentile(duration, 90) as 'Slowest 10% (s)', percentage(count(*), WHERE error is false) AS 'Success rate' WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} SINCE 1 WEEK AGO

FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) as 'Total transactions', percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) as 'Failed transactions (%)', count(*) * percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) / 100 as 'Failed transactions' WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT max(duration) FROM Transaction WHERE (transactionType = 'Web') AND appName = {{appName_nodejs}} SINCE 1 week ago LIMIT 5 EXTRAPOLATE FACET name TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*), percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) FACET dateOf(timestamp) WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*), percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS false) FACET dateOf(timestamp) WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE (transactionType = 'Web') AND appName = {{appName_nodejs}} SINCE last week EXTRAPOLATE FACET name

widgets.title: Transactions Errors Today Compared With 1 Week Ago

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE response.status = '404' AND transactionType = 'Web' AND appName = {{appName_nodejs}} TIMESERIES 10 MINUTES SINCE TODAY COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

widgets.title: Throughput Today Compared With 1 Week Ago

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Transaction WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} TIMESERIES 1 HOUR SINCE TODAY COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

widgets.title: Average Transaction Duration Today Compared With 1 Week Ago

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT AVERAGE(duration) FROM Transaction WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} TIMESERIES SINCE TODAY COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

widgets.title: Apdex Score Today Compared With 1 Week Ago

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT apdex(duration, t: 0.4) FROM Transaction WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} TIMESERIES SINCE TODAY COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM PageView SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}} FACET pageUrl TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET dateOf(timestamp), hourof(timestamp) TIMESERIES AUTO WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT count(*) FROM AjaxRequest WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}} FACET httpResponseCode
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView FACET countryCode WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView FACET city WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView FACET userAgentOS WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView FACET deviceType WHERE deviceType != 'Unknown' AND appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET errorClass TIMESERIES AUTO WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT uniques(errorMessage) FROM JavaScriptError WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT count(errorMessage) AS 'Count' FROM JavaScriptError WHERE (deviceType LIKE '%Desktop%') AND appName = {{appName_browser}} FACET `errorMessage`, `userAgentName` LIMIT 10
FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) FACET transactionUiName WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}}
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}} TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT latest(mongodb_ss_extra_info_page_faults) AS '' FROM Metric WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}}
SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 75) AS 'Seconds' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE appName = {{appName_browser}}
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM TransactionError WHERE appName = {{appName_nodejs}}
FROM Metric SELECT latest(mongodb_up) AS '' WHERE host.fullHostname = {{fullHostname}}
SELECT latest(memoryFreePercent) AS 'Percent (%)' FROM SystemSample WHERE fullHostname = {{fullHostname}}

nrqlQuery.query: FROM PageView SELECT uniques(appName) WHERE appName IS NOT NULL LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 MONTH AGO
FROM Transaction SELECT uniques(appName) WHERE appName IS NOT NULL LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 MONTH AGO
FROM SystemSample SELECT uniques(fullHostname) WHERE fullHostname IS NOT NULL SINCE 1 MONTH AGO
